are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_eve: Are you sure you want to delete this event permanently?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_cat: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
select_an_action_to_apply_for_all_events: Select an action to apply for all events as well as sub categories belonging to this category
remove_all_events_and_sub_categories_bel: Remove all events and sub-categories belonging to this category
select_another_category_to_move_all_even: Select another category to move all events and sub-categories belonging to this category.
all_events_belonging_to_this_category_wi: All events belonging to this category will be deleted, this cannot be undone.
purchase_event_sponsor_completed: Your purchase to sponsor your event has just been made successfully.
purchase_event_sponsor_pending_approval: Your purchase to sponsor your event has just been made successfully however it is pending an Admins approval.
seo_event_meta_description: Create your events and invite your friends to come
full_name_added_photo_s_on_your_event_me:
{full_name} added photo(s) on your event "{title}".
To see the photo detail, follow the link below: {link2}
users_added_a_photo_on_your_event_title: {users} added a photo on your event "{title}"
users_added_some_photos_on_your_event_ti: {users} added some photos on your event "{title}"
you_do_not_have_sufficient_permission_to: You do not have sufficient permission to delete this event.
